attributes.background: At the time of the Hillsborough disaster Ingham described the unlawfully-killed football fans as "tanked-up yobs". Following the inquiry verdict he has reported refused to apologise. HMQ doesn't need this sort of "knight".

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
